thread.title: Game 5, maybe series, turned on one pitch
thread.title_full: Game 5, maybe series, turned on one pitch

title: Game 5, maybe series, turned on one pitch
text:
Game 5, maybe series, turned on one pitch By Stephen Cameron October 22, 2015 Steve Cameron 
Steve Cameron has covered major league baseball for more than three decades. He is a special assignment reporter for The Mercury. 
Thousands of baseball games have turned on one pitch. It happened to the Royals on Wednesday, pushing the American League Championship Series back to Kauffman Stadium with Kansas City still up 3-2. Read More ...
